KonTruck is a construction WordPress theme for all kinds of building, construction, renovation, reconstruction, home repair & maintenance service websites.

item.title: Header_3
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded:
Call us Now! +18 - 2222 - 3555 Talk to us example@gmail.com Get a quote icon

Welcome to KonTruk, a place where all contruction shops take on a whole new dimension of beautiful.

Monkey D. Fun CEO, Monkey D. Fun
Contact Info
  • +321 654 - 6821
  • 28 Watchung Ave Belleville, New Jersey, USA
  • Mon - Fri: 7am to 7pm
    Sat - Sun: 8am to 6pm
